channel.title: [EXTREME CONTENT] Enchanta - 25 skills | 28 bosses | Construction | Bank tabs &
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.enchanta.net/welcome/images/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://www.enchanta.net/play.php"]PLAY NOW[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.enchanta.net/welcome"]LANDING PAGE[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.enchanta.net/forum.php"]FORUMS [/URL]| [URL=http://"http://www.enchanta.net/vote.php"]VOTE[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.enchanta.net/hiscore.php"]HIGHSCORES[/URL][/SIZE]
[FONT=comic sans ms] [/FONT][SIZE=2][FONT=comic sans ms]Get ready for the most extreme Runecape private server on the market. Enchanta offers all 25 skills, active pking, active pvm, unique minigames, and 100% stability, combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and beautiful gameplay Enchanta might just be one of the best Runescape Private Servers you'll ever play.[/FONT] [B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1NnhfUn.png[/img] [SIZE=2][B][FONT=comic sans ms][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]Prestige style gameplay [/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT][/B][/SIZE] Reached level 99 in a skill? The fun doesn't end there.
[/B][FONT=comic sans ms]In Enchanta you can prestige your skills up to 10 times, with each time getting gradually harder. Prestiging offers great benefits, like cash rewards, increasing your rank/class in game and skill specific perks. [/FONT] [COLOR=#ffffff] [/COLOR][B][COLOR=#0000FF]Other features
[/COLOR] [SIZE=2]Skills available (Total: 25)[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF] Full construction Full farming Full slayer Hunter Full summoning Dungeoneering Full crafting Full cooking Full fishing Full woodcutting Full Fletching Full mining Fully working range, with all weapons coded. Full agility - (every single course 100%.) [/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]Full thieving Full Runecrafting, with multiples. Full Herblore, with every single potion working. Full Smithing Full Firemaking
[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Combat features:[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF] Fully working ancient curses Fully working normal spellbook, and ancient spell book Perfect switches Perfect max hit formulas Realistic accuracy formulas Every single weapon working All special attacks working Well structured pk point shop. PK raffle (Win cash prizes) PK Streak system
[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Duel arena:[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2] [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]Solid duel arena, no bugs or cheats or dupes, option for DDS only duels. [/SIZE][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2] [/SIZE]
[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Minigames[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2] [SIZE=2]Pest control - (Cash rewards + void) Barrows (Cash rewards + barrows equipment) Zombie SWAT - (Boots and gauntlets) Fight pits - (Tokkul) Champions Challenge - (Defenders) Dominion Tower - (Zaryte bow, dark energy shield(custom), cash rewards.) Fight caves - (2 modes, easy and hard) (both capes)
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Quests [/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Prologue[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2] [/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Desert treasure - Ancient magicks Songs of many rains Biohazard Cooks Assisant Kings favour Vampire Slayer Ogre threat Plague city Books of the gods
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2]Other features [/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2][COLOR=#0000FF]NPC's fully clipped, no walking into walls. Clan slayer Fully working following with dancing Cutscenes in quests Nex with correct maps and minions. 28 Bosses in total including Dominion tower bosses Bank tabs PVP Streak with rewards Fully synced Mob loot database on website New items such as steadfast, pernix Double XP weekends, every week. Double Drops, and double XP constantly through school-breaks. Huge game world to explore No, x logging or losing progress when disconnecting, char stays online for 60 seconds. Double XP for voting. Decent full screen. Fully working clan chat and clan settings Yell channel available for all users[/COLOR]
Media [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CZZhQxM.png[/img]
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#ffffff][SIZE=3][SIZE=2][IMG]http://gyazo.com/152ef6f48a34d4be704883920d55cb56.png[/img] [/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0140OE2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TxhMZEu.png[/img] [/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t9F7WdE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kv6Wcsn.png[/img]
[/B][FONT=comic sans ms] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zehDFiE.png[/img]
[/FONT]
[/SIZE] [/CENTER]

item.description:
@EnchantaRSPS wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://“http://www.enchanta.net/play.php”]PLAY NOW[/URL] | [URL=http://“http://www.enchanta.net/welcome”]LANDING PAGE[/URL] | [URL=http://“http://www.enchanta.net/forum.php”]FORUMS [/URL]| [URL=http://“http://www.enchanta.net/vote.php”]VOTE[/URL] | [URL=http://“http://www.enchanta.net/hiscore.php”]HIGHSCORES[/URL][/SIZE]

[FONT=comic sans ms]
[/FONT][SIZE=2][FONT=comic sans ms]Get ready for the most extreme Runecape private server on the market.
Enchanta offers all 25 skills, active pking, active pvm, unique minigames, and 100% stability, combined with staff professionalism,
unique interfaces, and beautiful gameplay
Enchanta might just be one of the best Runescape Private Servers you’ll ever play.[/FONT]
[B]

[SIZE=2][B][FONT=comic sans ms][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]Prestige style gameplay
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT][/B][/SIZE]
Reached level 99 in a skill?
The fun doesn’t end there.

[/B][FONT=comic sans ms]In Enchanta you can prestige your skills up to 10 times, with each time getting gradually harder.
Prestiging offers great benefits, like cash rewards, increasing your rank/class in game and skill specific perks. [/FONT]
[COLOR=#ffffff]
[/COLOR][B][COLOR=#0000FF]Other features

[/COLOR] [SIZE=2]Skills available (Total: 25)[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF]
Full construction
Full farming
Full slayer
Hunter
Full summoning
Dungeoneering
Full crafting
Full cooking
Full fishing
Full woodcutting
Full Fletching
Full mining
Fully working range, with all weapons coded.
Full agility - (every single course 100%.)
[/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]Full thieving
Full Runecrafting, with multiples.
Full Herblore, with every single potion working.
Full Smithing
Full Firemaking

[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Combat features:[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF]
Fully working ancient curses
Fully working normal spellbook, and ancient spell book
Perfect switches
Perfect max hit formulas
Realistic accuracy formulas
Every single weapon working
All special attacks working
Well structured pk point shop.
PK raffle (Win cash prizes)
PK Streak system

[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Duel arena:[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]Solid duel arena, no bugs or cheats or dupes, option for DDS only duels. [/SIZE][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE]

[/COLOR][SIZE=2]Minigames[/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2]
[SIZE=2]Pest control - (Cash rewards + void)
Barrows (Cash rewards + barrows equipment)
Zombie SWAT - (Boots and gauntlets)
Fight pits - (Tokkul)
Champions Challenge - (Defenders)
Dominion Tower - (Zaryte bow, dark energy shield(custom), cash rewards.)
Fight caves - (2 modes, easy and hard) (both capes)

[/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Quests
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Prologue[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#0000FF][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=2]Desert treasure - Ancient magicks
Songs of many rains
Biohazard
Cooks Assisant
Kings favour
Vampire Slayer
Ogre threat
Plague city
Books of the gods

[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2]Other features
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE][SIZE=2][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][SIZE=2][COLOR=#0000FF]NPC’s fully clipped, no walking into walls.
Clan slayer
Fully working following with dancing
Cutscenes in quests
Nex with correct maps and minions.
28 Bosses in total including Dominion tower bosses
Bank tabs
PVP Streak with rewards
Fully synced Mob loot database on website
New items such as steadfast, pernix
Double XP weekends, every week.
Double Drops, and double XP constantly through school-breaks.
Huge game world to explore
No, x logging or losing progress when disconnecting, char stays online for 60 seconds.
Double XP for voting.
Decent full screen.
Fully working clan chat and clan settings
Yell channel available for all users[/COLOR]

Media

[/SIZE]
